SEARCH
Package nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.localization

Interface ILocalizer

public interface ILocalizer
Represents a class that can localize strings.
Author:
Pim

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description

    getAvailableLocales()
    Gets a list of Locales that are currently available.

    Retrieves a localized message using the default locale.

  • Method Details

    • getMessage

      String getMessage(String key, Locale locale, Object... args)
      Retrieves a localized message.
      Parameters:
      key - The key of the message.
      locale - The Locale to use.
      args - The arguments of the message, if any.
      Returns:
      The localized message associated with the provided key.

    • getMessage

      String getMessage(String key, Object... args)
      Retrieves a localized message using the default locale.
      Parameters:
      key - The key of the message.
      args - The arguments of the message, if any.
      Returns:
      The localized message associated with the provided key.
      Throws:
      MissingResourceException - When no mapping for the key can be found.

    • getStructureType

      default String getStructureType(StructureType structureType)
      Shortcut getMessage(String, Object...) for StructureType.getLocalizationKey().
      Parameters:
      structureType - The structure type to localize.
      Returns:
      The localized name of the structure type.

    • getStructureType

      default String getStructureType(AbstractStructure structure)
      See getStructureType(StructureType)

    • getAvailableLocales

      List<Locale> getAvailableLocales()
      Gets a list of Locales that are currently available.
      Returns:
      The list of available locales.
